articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 colors, renders leak. See them now. - Mashable

articles.description: Metal Gear Solid Master Collection Vol. 1 gets new 2.1.0 update, including tech upgrades on Nintendo Switch 2 - check out the patch notes.

articles.title: Everything Announced At The February PlayStation State Of Play - Game Informer
articles.description: Here's everything announced at the February 2026 State of Play, in case you missed the big stream.

articles.title: Open world PS5 game Project Windless is part-God of War, part-Dynasty Warriors, and has a veteran Far Cry director as its lead - Eurogamer
articles.description: Krafton has unveiled open-world fantasy adventure Project Windless for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 5 Pro.

articles.title: Castlevania: Belmont's Curse Unveiled For Switch, Launching In 2026 - Nintendo Life
Resident Evil Requiem Trailer Reveals Leon Is, Sadly, Once Again Infected — And Another Returning Character | Sony State of Play - IGN
articles.description: Tonight's State of Play broadcast has given us one last look at Capcom's tantalizing Resident Evil: Requiem — and confirmed what many fans had previously deduced: Leon S. Kennedy is once again infected.

articles.title: New ‘God of War’ Game ‘Sons of Sparta’ Surprise Launches on PlayStation, Original Trilogy Remake in the Works - Variety
articles.description: A new "God of War" game surprise launched for PlayStation Thursday, just as the publisher revealed a remake of the original "God of War" trilogy is in the works.

articles.title: Crystal Dynamics just announced the first new Legacy of Kain game in 23 years (and another slick-looking Soul Reaver remaster, too) - Eurogamer
articles.description: Legacy of Kain is back with an old classic, and some fresh blood: and both release sooner than you'd think.

articles.title: ‘Marathon’ Announces Free Open Beta Release Date, And It’s A Bit Late - Forbes
articles.description: Bungie has announced the dates for Marathon's free open beta preview test, and it's going to be pretty late in the game.

articles.title: Silent Hill: Townfall launches in 2026 for PS5, PC; reveal trailer - Gematsu
articles.description: Silent Hill: Townfall will launch in 2026 for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, publishers Konami and Annapurna Interactive, and developer Screen Burn Interactive announced.

articles.title: Rayman 30th Anniversary Edition Releases Tomorrow, Collects Five Versions Of The Original Game - Game Informer
articles.description: Starting tomorrow you can play the PlayStation, Atari Jaguar, MS-DOS, Game Boy Advance, and Game Boy Color versions of the original Rayman in one release.

articles.title: DEAD OR ALIVE 6 Last Round announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC - Gematsu
articles.description: Publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Team NINJA have announced DEAD OR ALIVE 6 Last Round for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC (Steam). It will launch on June 25 for $39.99 / £32.99 / €39.99 / ¥6,3…

articles.title: Apple sees $200 billion market-cap wipeout as stock slides on AI fears - MarketWatch
articles.description: Apple reportedly is facing even more snags in its planned rollout of a more advanced version of Siri, which has been long delayed

articles.title: Highguard dev blames content creators for the game's failure - "It was dead on arrival" - Notebookcheck
YouTube finally launches a dedicated app for Apple Vision Pro - TechCrunch
articles.description: When Apple Vision Pro first came out two years ago, YouTube hesitated to release a dedicated app. Today is the day they officially launch one.

articles.title: Attackers prompted Gemini over 100,000 times while trying to clone it, Google says - Ars Technica
articles.description: Distillation technique lets copycats mimic Gemini at a fraction of the development cost.

articles.description: They aren't cheap at $330, but Sony's new flagship noise-canceling earbuds may very well be the best out there right now. Here's why.

articles.title: High On Life 2′ s Intro Is One Of The Best Video Game Openings Ever - Kotaku
articles.description: More games should include fast-paced montages at the start and stop wasting my time
